edge: Hellboy accidentally kills transformed vampire Esteban Ruiz during a wrestling match in present-day Tijuana, Mexico.
Hellboy is assigned by B.P.R.D. leader Trevor Bruttenholm to assist the Osiris Club in hunting three giants in Great Britain.
Bruttenholm raised Hellboy instead of killing him when he came into the human world as a result of Project Ragna Rok by the Nazis.
Fairy Gruagach is advised by witch Baba Yaga to retrieve Nimue's limbs so that she may grant his wish for revenge against Hellboy.
The Osiris Club's seer, Lady Hatton, reveals that B.P.R.D. leader Bruttenholm was meant to kill Hellboy when he came into the human world.
Alice Monaghan, a medium rescued by Hellboy as a baby, recognizes him when he collapses in her flat after being betrayed and nearly killed by the hunters during the hunt for three giants.

Alice recognizes Nimue as a person she once rescued from fairies as a baby, when Nimue appeared in her flat. Nimue seeks Hellboy to cause the apocalypse and Alice channels Hatton's spirit to reveal this information.
Gruagach is revealed as the changeling who took baby Alice's place. Hellboy branded him with iron and forced him to return Alice, which led to Gruagach hating Hellboy.
Daimio takes Hellboy and the others to M11 headquarters before secretly acquiring a special bullet to kill Hellboy.
Hellboy is magically transported to Baba Yaga's house after an argument with Bruttenholm about his adoption.
Hellboy shoots out Baba Yaga's eye before being talked into giving up one of his eyes for Nimue's location.
Nimue reveals herself fully restored and kills her coven at Pendleton, but spares Ganeida.
Hellboy attempts to stop Nimue, but is overwhelmed as she poisons Alice and flees.
Ganeida directs Hellboy to the resting place of Merlin to save Alice.
Alice reveals to Daimio that she was a sole survivor of a demonic jaguar attack.
